name: seo-ecommercex
description: Deco MCP server with an Astro documentation site, tools and workflows

scripts.dev: cd view && npm run dev & cd server && npm run dev:worker
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "cd view && npm run dev" "cd server && npm run dev:worker"
scripts.deploy: cd view && npm run build && cd ../server && npm run deploy
scripts.smoke: powershell -Command "Start-Job { Start-Sleep -Seconds 5; $env:SMOKE_WAIT_MS=45000; npm --prefix server run smoke } | Out-Null; npm run dev:all"
